pages.text: A cauldron with a hole in it. Why would anyone want that? Well, as it happens it's quite a useful fluid handling device for the aspiring Hedgemage, and a good source of hydration for $(l:blocks/flooded_soil_entry)Flooded Soil$().

A leaky cauldron attempts to move the fluid it contains downward, either into the world directly, or into fluid tanks or flooded soil placed below it. To create a leaky cauldron, one must drop an anvil on a regular cauldron. Yes, really.
